Text.Page: Moving on after Intrepid's crash, the Vanguard Initiative encountered the Khirians.
We can't stay here forever. We have a duty to our soldiers and the Valkyon Federation.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Your orders, sir?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
I've dispatched a scout. Catch up with him and assist with the reconnaissance.

I saw the wreckage, but you can't get there from here.

I'm supposed to fire off a flare, but the launcher won't work. Why don't you try it?

There's the answering flare. We're to press on.

I don't know about the wounded, but I can't fight these mandrills. Maybe you could clear us a small path?
I don't recognize your garb or armaments. Who are you?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'm from the far south."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

That should not be possible. The dark clouds keep us trapped. If what you say is true, Rhodos must hear it.

Cross this bridge to get to our camp. Ask to see Rhodos. Give him this scroll. I will vouch for you.
What's this? Bagi writes that you're from the south. Is this true?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"It is true."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Why are you here? How is it you encounter my camp?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Our ship crashed in the jungle."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

You may be clever, but I can't tell if you're lying, but there is one who can.

Across the trail from our camp, you will see a horned hut. Madat can judge the truth of your words.
Ah, the skyfaller.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What did you say?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Don't look so surprised. I watched your great air fish fall out of the sky. You must be from the outside.

Perhaps our time has come.

I believe your arrival heralds the coming of the Khirian victory over the cursed archdevas!

Hatishna! Tell Rhodos, "Hatishna!"
